linesOfText.text: Tap Bart Simpson to change him
Tap Bart Simpson to make him jump
Tap Bart to make him small and big again
Tap Bart Simpson to make him move left then right
Tap Bart to move and scale him at the same time
Tap Bart Simpson to make him spin forever
Tap Bart to make him spin and get small (spiral)
Continuously fade in then fade out object
Rotating object that doesnt stop until first swipe
rolling object that stops after first swipe - should be stopped now
rolling object that never stops rotating
Rotating object that stops then starts again after swipe
Rolling object that stops after first swipe
Object jumping in, then jumping out after swipe
Object jumping in and continuing after text is shown
